page.title: 09A CROSS HOUSEWIFE & MOTHER
page.content: Mrs.Dennison gets up at 8.30am. The girls get their own{breakfast}& make their own beds, while she{gets Sean {ready for school.}After he is away, she puts the{washing}in the washing machine & the{dishes}in the dishwasher.{Dinner}is at{12.30pm}after which she{hoovers}and{dusts.}On{Monday &{Wednesday}she goes with Alan to the {playgroup.}On{Tuesday}she goes to the {bank}- she{cycles}if it is a nice day. On{Thursday}she{visits her mother.}On {Friday}she does the{ironing}&{tidies {up the house.}The family always has {tea}together{(between 5 & 6pm)}- sometimes there are{8-10 people}when friends stay for tea. Then the girls do{fiddle practice}&{homework.}On {Wednesday}&{Saturday evenings}in {summer}she plays{netball,}& in the {winter}she{sews, writes letters &{watches TV.
